identity.name: The Bloomsbury Coven
identity.mood: A dimly lit library in 1920s London, filled with velvet armchairs, ancient grimoires, and the scent of incense.

usage_rules.h1: Italiana, text-5xl md:text-7xl, tracking-tight, leading-none, text-accent-gold
usage_rules.h3: Cinzel Decorative, text-xl md:text-2xl, font-bold, text-accent-rose
usage_rules.caption: Montserrat, text-xs, tracking-[0.2em], uppercase, text-muted-foreground

spacing.layout_rules: Use generous negative space. Avoid clutter. Let the typography breathe.

textures.paper: Use a subtle paper grain overlay on cards with 5% opacity.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 font-serif tracking-widest uppercase text-sm px-8 py-3 rounded-sm border border-primary/50 shadow-glow transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent text-primary border border-primary/30 hover:bg-primary/10 font-serif tracking-widest uppercase text-sm px-8 py-3 rounded-sm transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-accent hover:text-accent/80 font-serif italic hover:underline transition-all

cards.base: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-border p-8 rounded-sm hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden

inputs.base: bg-input/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 font-body text-foreground placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 rounded-sm

layout_strategies.grid_system: Use the 'Tetris' grid (Mode A) for browsing. Mix wide hero cards (col-span-2) with tall vertical cards (row-span-2) and small square fillers.
layout_strategies.asymmetry: Avoid perfect symmetry. Offset text blocks. Use overlapping images with z-index.
layout_strategies.alignment: Center headings for dramatic effect, but keep body text left-aligned for readability.

motion.hover_effects: Subtle lift (-translate-y-1), glow intensification, border color shift.
motion.page_load: Staggered fade-in with slight upward motion (framer-motion).

assets.icons: Use 'Lucide React' with thin stroke width (1.5px) to match the elegant aesthetic.

setup: Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge`
Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors and fonts defined in `design_system`.
Add the Google Fonts import to `index.css`.
Create a `Layout` component that applies the background color and texture globally.
implementation_priorities: Implement the 'Bloomsbury' color palette immediately. No default shadcn slate/zinc.
Build the 'Tetris Grid' layout for the Deities and Historical Figures pages.
Create a reusable 'GlassCard' component that implements the visual enhancers (border, blur, noise).
Ensure all text is readable against the dark background (check contrast).
universal_rules: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Do NOT use default scrollbars (customize them to be thin and gold).
